Literature.Title: Small Amphiphilic Peptides: Activity Against a Broad Range of Drug-Resistant Bacteria and Structural Insight into Membranolytic Properties.
Literature.Author: Lohan S, Mandal D, Choi W, Konshina AG, Tiwari RK, Efremov RG, Maslennikov I, Parang K

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-1556(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=6.2µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27883(MIC=>100µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>100µg/ml)
